group.para: This is the documentation for the commands of the Nictiz YATC {$yatcRepositoryName}/{$yatcComponentName} component. These commands reside in the {$yatcRepositoryName}/{$yatcComponentName}/bin subdirectory.

entry.para: It is recommended that the YATC-shared/bin subdirectory is on the system's path. This makes sure the base yatc command can be found.
All commands have a -help flag that provides a brief explanation of the command.

To specify all applications or versions for a command, you can use either #all or %all as argument. The %all was added because in some systems (for instance Windows Powershell), the # character acts as the start of a comment.
All processing is governed by the component's data/$DATAFILENAME document. See here for documentation.
See here for general information on YATC parameters.
